resources.string: In the camera view, hold the phone as flat/horizontal as possible to the ground and move the phone in a smooth, circular motion following the guide. You should see a collection of dots appear after a few seconds which represent an anchor point for the model. Tap them to render it.

Select the share button and after rendering the model a shareable code will be generated. Another phone can enter this code on the Explore screen. Point the camera in the general area and press resolve to render the model. \n\nNote: Anchor points only last 24 hours due to AR limitations.

Dots not appearing: The app uses feature points to detect planes so the surface may be too reflective or smooth. Try on another surface, or try backing out and in to the camera again. \n\nModel not appearing: Some models are highly complex, depending on your phone\'s hardware they may cause issues or not render properly. There are very large models which may be placed above your head, try looking up.
